A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Terrible movie\, but the bigger issue I have is the backlash to the fans that are perpetuating the backlash to the film.  I've heard disappointed fans called everything from "fanboys/girls"\, crybabies\, sexist and racist.  Can't we just voice our opinion on this clunker of a movie without being labeled something derogatory?  

I just saw this movie and it really stunk.  I've been following reviews for a few days because I had a bad feeling about this movie and the more I heard\, the less I cared about spoilers.  

What is interesting to me is that the majority of the reviews I read on this site are not complimentary.  It isn't a large majority\, but my point is\, how can RT still be giving it a 51% audience review???  I would imagine it to be MUCH\, MUCH Lower.  

And\, 91% favorablility from critics??  Please.  I wonder how much each were paid for their total bunk reviews.
